item.title: Two JW Marriott hotels have been ranked in the top 10 TripAdvisor Travelers' Choices for Korea
item.description:
Source: TripAdvisor website. The Lotte Hotel Seoul. TripAdvisor’s 2015 Travelers’ Choice Awards for hotels in Korea ranked the following as the top ten: Lotte Hotel Seoul, with a rating of 4.5 out of 5 from 1,849 reviews. The Plaza Conrad Seoul JW Marriott Dongdaemun Square Seoul Park Hyatt Seoul The Shilla Seoul Sheraton Seoul D Cube City Hotel The Westin Chosun Seoul The Ritz-Carlton, Seoul The JW Marriott Seoul Curious?..

item.title: Hoi An has the highest number of top hotels according to TripAdvisor
item.description:
Hanoi and Hoi An are home to Vietnam’s highest-rated hotels. In 2015, TripAdvisor’s Travelers’ Choice Awards recognized ten top hotels in Vietnam, with three located in Hanoi and three in Hoi An. An additional two hotels in the top 25 are also situated in Hoi An. The top ten hotels are: Source: TripAdvisor. The Hanoi Elegance Diamond Hotel. Hanoi Elegance Diamond Hotel: Garnering 1,832 “excellent” ratings out of 2,064 total reviews...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hoi-an-has-the-highest-number-of-top-hotels-according-to-tripadvisor/

item.title: The World Bank ranks the UAE in the top 10 for enhancing the business environment
item.description:
A new World Bank Group study reveals that local businesses in the Middle East have faced difficulties over the past year. While some economies, such as the UAE—one of the top 10 global improvers—enhanced their business environments, the Middle East and North Africa region saw relatively slow regulatory reform. According to Doing Business 2015: Going Beyond Efficiency, 55% of economies in the region implemented business regulatory reforms. This is comparable to 60% in East Asia and the Pacific but indicates that the reforms were limited in scope...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-world-bank-ranks-the-uae-in-the-top-10-for-enhancing-the-business-environment/

item.title: Investors are increasingly optimistic about placing foreign direct investment in Singapore
item.description:
Singapore achieved a top-ten ranking in the 2016 AT Kearney Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) Confidence Index. The city-state climbed five positions, representing the most significant advancement in the rankings, securing the 10th spot. This index provides a future-oriented assessment of how political, economic, and regulatory shifts are likely to influence FDI inflows into various countries in the coming years. Since its inception in 1998, the study has consistently identified the preferred global destinations for FDI, with the index rankings closely mirroring actual global FDI inflows...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/investors-are-increasingly-optimistic-about-placing-foreign-direct-investment-in-singapore/

item.title: The top 10 global consumer trends for 2015 focus on multitasking and collaboration
item.description:
Source: Euromonitor. Market research firm Euromonitor International recently published their findings on the top 10 global consumer trends for 2015. Euromonitor’s Top 10 Global Consumer Trends 2015 report states that consumers, pressed for time, are seeking convenience, diverse options, global product availability, and instant satisfaction. They aim to get the most out of their time and money, looking for products and services that meet multiple needs. As an illustration, a Swedish taxi service provides in-car therapists for their stressed and busy clients at a rate of US$165 per hour...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-top-10-global-consumer-trends-for-2015-focus-on-multitasking-and-collaboration/

item.title: Langkawi hotels are prominently featured in the top 10 Travelers' Choice awards on TripAdvisor
item.description:
In 2015, TripAdvisor’s Travelers’ Choice Awards recognized four Langkawi hotels in their top 10 for Malaysia. Additionally, Shangri-La properties secured two spots within the top 10, with a third ranking 11th. Source: TripAdvisor website. The Danna Langkawi Malaysia. Here are the top 10 hotels: The Danna Langkawi Malaysia, Pantai Kok, holds a 5 out of 5 rating from 1,777 reviews. It received an “excellent” rating from 1,508 reviewers, and “very good” from 203 reviewers...
